member.name: T:WhatsAppChatParser.JSONExtensions
member.summary: Extension method to get JSON string representation of messages

member.name: M:WhatsAppChatParser.JSONExtensions.ToJSON(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{WhatsAppChatParser.Message})
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string
member.param: Messages to serialize
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:WhatsAppChatParser.JSONExtensions.ToJSON(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{WhatsAppChatParser.Message},Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.
member.param: Messages to serialize
The Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

member.name: M:WhatsAppChatParser.JSONExtensions.ToJSON(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{WhatsAppChatParser.Message},System.Type,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using a type, formatting and Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.
member.param: Messages to serialize

The type of the value being serialized. This parameter is used when Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer.TypeNameHandling is Newtonsoft.Json.TypeNameHandling.Auto to write out the type name if the type of the value does not match. Specifying the type is optional.
The Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings used to serialize the object. If this is null, default serialization settings will be used.
member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.
